lead_paragraph: Gonzalo P. Curiel, once a prosecutor and now the judge in the Trump University case, lived under federal protection for a year after an inmate tied to a Mexican cartel was recorded threatening him.

byline.contributor: Julia Preston contributed reporting. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

headline.print_headline: Judge Faulted by Trump Has Faced a Lot Worse
headline.main: That Judge Attacked by Donald Trump? He’s Faced a Lot Worse

snippet: Gonzalo P. Curiel, once a prosecutor and now the judge in the Trump University case, lived under federal protection for a year after an inmate tied to a Mexican cartel was recorded threatening him.
abstract: Profile of federal Judge Gonzalo P Curiel, who has become target of Donald Trump's ire on presidential campaign trail because he is presiding over lawsuit filed against Trump by former Trump University students.
